name: Old Fashioned
description: A timeless classic with bold whiskey notes, softened by a touch of sugar and aromatic bitters.

name: Negroni
description: A sophisticated blend of gin, Campari, and vermouth, delivering a bittersweet punch.

name: Margarita
description: Zesty lime and tequila dance on your palate, with a salty rim for the perfect finish.

name: Daiquiri
description: A vibrant mix of rum and lime, sweetened to perfection for a tropical escape.

name: Dry Martini
description: Crisp and elegant, with gin's botanical notes shining through a whisper of vermouth.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Rich espresso meets smooth vodka, creating a bold yet velvety pick-me-up.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: A silky blend of whiskey and lemon, balanced with a touch of sweetness.

name: Manhattan
description: A refined mix of whiskey and vermouth, with bitters adding depth and allure.

name: Aperol Spritz
description: Effervescent and vibrant, with Aperol’s citrusy bitterness and a prosecco sparkle.

name: Mojito
description: Fresh mint and lime mingle with rum for a crisp, invigorating sip.

name: Moscow Mule
description: Spicy ginger beer and zesty lime meet vodka in a refreshing, copper-mug classic.

name: Paloma
description: Tart grapefruit and tequila create a bright, bubbly delight.

name: Gin Tonic
description: Crisp gin and tonic with a citrus twist, effortlessly refreshing.

name: Mai Tai
description: A tropical burst of rum, citrus, and almond sweetness, pure island bliss.

name: Bloody Mary
description: Savory and bold, with a spicy kick to awaken your senses.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A chic blend of cranberry and vodka, with a zesty lime finish.

name: Tom Collins
description: Bright lemon and gin fizz, a refreshing nod to tradition.

name: Caipirinha
description: Zesty lime and cachaça unite for a vibrant Brazilian escape.

name: Piña Colada
description: Creamy coconut and pineapple transport you to a tropical paradise.

name: Sazerac
description: A bold rye whiskey embrace with a hint of absinthe mystique.

name: Virgin Mojito
description: Crisp mint and lime sparkle in this alcohol-free refresher.

name: Shirley Temple
description: Sweet grenadine and ginger ale, topped with a cherry delight.

name: Virgin Piña Colada
description: Creamy coconut and pineapple for a non-alcoholic tropical escape.

name: Nojito
description: A minty, lime-infused fizz, perfect for a refreshing break.

name: Lemon Basil Cooler
description: Zesty lemon meets aromatic basil in a crisp, cooling sip.

name: Virgin Mary
description: A savory, spicy tomato blend with a bold, tangy kick.

name: Cucumber Cooler
description: Cool cucumber and lime create a light, rejuvenating refresher.

name: Virgin Daiquiri
description: Tart lime and subtle sweetness, a zesty non-alcoholic delight.

name: Arnold Palmer
description: A refreshing blend of iced tea and lemonade, perfectly balanced.

name: Pineapple Ginger Sparkler
description: Tropical pineapple and spicy ginger ale for a vibrant sip.
